post:
PROMO CODE: **JCE7Y4U0T9**

50% off on annual terms for any UK SSD KVM products

**ORDER LINK**: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=29

Plans info:

* E3-1270v6 or E-2276G CPU's 
* DDR4 RAM
* NVME SSD's
* Clouvider DC London ([Test IP/LG](https://as62240.net/tools "Test IP/LG"))
* DDOS Protected

<hr>

Example plans:

* 1 CPU Core (Equal Share)
* 512 MB Ram
* 10 GB Pure NVMe SSD Disk space
* 500 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)
* 1 x IPv4 address
* 1 x /64 IPv6
* Full daily backup
**PRICE: €12 /year**
<hr>

* 2 CPU Core (Equal Share)
* 1024 MB Ram
* 15 GB Pure NVMe SSD Disk space
* 1000 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)
* 1 x IPv4 address
* 1 x /64 IPv6
* Full daily backup
**PRICE: 15 /year**

* Full daily backup
**PRICE: €45 /year**

<hr>

* 4096 MB Ram
* 40 GB Pure NVMe SSD Disk space
* 4000 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)
* 1 x IPv4 address
* 1 x /64 IPv6
* Full daily backup
**PRICE: €60 /year**

<hr>

Brief terms & info:

1. No torrents
2. No tor
3. No bulk mailing
4. No open proxies
5. No click bots, hitleap or similar
6. CPU Policy is the 1st Item: https://inceptionhosting.com/terms.html
7. Do not order via a proxy or VPN unless you are willing to also provide additional ID.
8. Orders from China or Brazil will be blocked automatically
9. These are self-managed products.
10. Please actually read the email marked [READ BEFORE OPENING A SUPPORT TICKET] after you order.
11. PayPal subscriptions are optional and your choice, if you chose a subscription, please also chose to manage it yourself.
12. If installing windows you must use the provided virtio drivers which is available under the drivers tab when installing. Long term use of ide drivers will be considered unstable and puts emulation overhead on the host nodes so will be shut down.
13. Agreeing to the terms without reading them is your decision, you will still be held to them.
14. Please do not ask to convert existing plans, the ability to do these sales is more complex than price alone, many factors are involved, you are as always welcome to order additional services and cancel your old ones.

If you have any questions... shoot!
